hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1690 a.n today's date is October
15 2018 and subtly episode is warning to
trump unwise to mess with the central
bank let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now as we can
see the central bankers they understand
what is going on here and we know that
Trump continually contradicts the
central bank and I do believe panel is
the inside man and I do believe that
this is being done on purpose just like
where Trump was out there saying listen
I don't like sessions we need a better
Attorney General actually what he was
doing was doing the opposite the same
thing is happening here where he's
contradicting Powell saying that he
thought he was an easy money Fed but it
looks like he's an interest rate fed
it's not a good thing in what he is
doing which means this is exactly what
he wants him to do because he knows if
he raises the interest rates he knows it
will bring down the economy he knows the
Fed will be blamed and Trump through his
tweets already said listen we will blame
the Fed if the economy comes down
because they are the ones who are
raising the interest rates the economy
that I'm in control over is doing
fantastically now of course we know that
these numbers are manipulated this is
why we've been following the economy for
such a long time so we understand what
is really going on here where they can't
say hey retail is down because of bad
weather hurricanes and things like that
no retail is down because the economy's
falling apart
I mean look at Sears Sears finally
declared bankruptcy we see the CEO has
stepped down we see alanna stores going
through bankruptcy a lot of stores are
very nervous about this holiday season
and of course they're blaming it on
tariffs and everything like that what
they're really worried about is that the
American person the everyday person
they're not going out and spending the
money now if we look at core retail
sales right now they have dropped by the
most
in 16 months and restaurants aren't
doing any better now when we look at the
September numbers they were expecting it
to rebound like don't worry August was a
slowdown September is going to be
fantastic but it missed completely and
the data only went up by 0.1 percent
month on month they were expecting a
point six percent rise then when you
start stripping things out if you remove
autos and you remove fuel you can see
that retail sales are not that great
actually they have dropped and we see
that fuel prices have been inching up
and gas station spending has dropped we
also see that grocery stores are down by
negative 0.1% health and personal care
stores are down by point negative 0.3%
department stores they are down by
negative 0.8% and when we start to look
at this we can see that retail is not
doing well actually if we look at
restaurants we see they've had a huge
drop in spending down 1.8% the most
since 2016 of course that blaming it on
the hurricane but remember the rest of
the country didn't get the hurricane
only certain small towns and think about
this for a second
wouldn't you think retail sales would
have skyrocketed because everyone was
out buying fuel right for the hurricane
everyone was out buying generators
batteries extra food extra water extra
supplies you would think that retail
sales would be skyrocketing you think
they would be fantastic because people
were buying double of everything you
went they went to the gas station and
they filled up and they filled up their
tank and then he took out three four
other tanks and they filled those up so
you would think that we would see retail
sales doing fantastically if there's a
storm ready to hit we didn't see this at
all because the overall country cannot
support what we have today
people are not spending why aren't they
spending it's because they don't have
high-paying jobs remember what Trump is
doing right now he is preparing the
economy for the transition what comes
after he can't fix a central bank system
which is already broken which is already
doomed the only thing he can do is get
rid of the globalist trade deals revamp
everything and make it a positive place
where manufacturers would want to come
back to the United States and that's
what he is in process of doing right now
we know that Russia and China they've
been talking about using their national
currencies sidestepping the dollar and
they've been doing this and remember the
dollar isn't the people's dollar the
dollar is a Federal Reserve Note it
belongs to the Federal Reserve isn't
that something that people wanted this
was something that was forced upon the
people now Russia is out there and
they're saying listen when the dollar
completely implodes on itself or before
that time we have the ability to switch
settlements in national currencies with
maybe any country that's out there and
they're making preparations to do this
and they're saying that Russia and
British companies could switch to
settlements in rubles and pounds
sidestepping the u.s. currency
transaction and China and Russia have
already done this Iran and Russia have
done this and we're gonna see many other
countries join in on this and there are
already many countries that are doing
this why because the central bank system
is completely breaking down right now
and they were expecting someone else in
office of course and they were expecting
to move into a war to explain away why
this system is completely imploding all
they have now is to blame everything on
Trump and his tariffs of fiscal policy
his tax cuts and things like that but
it's not going to work because he
actually tricked them by manipulating
the data that they've been manipulating
all along and he's taken the magic wand
and said listen the economy is doing
great why do you keep talking about
reset
why do you keep talking about depression
it doesn't make sense I mean one minute
you were telling us that everything was
fantastic and the numbers were worse off
now the numbers are better and that
you're telling us that we're going into
a recession and going into a depression
something doesn't make sense
now former Federal Reserve chairwoman
Janet Yellen pushback on Trump's recent
criticism of the central bank she said
his comments are unwise
she said obviously presidents can speak
out if they choose to and give their
opinions about policy there's no law
against that but I don't think it's wise
to criticize and contradict the Fed at
this time now this is very interesting
because she's telling Trump back off
it's like a warning don't push us we
will strike back and we know the central
bank has the power to do this they can
control nations they control the deep
state there there's the central bank is
the source of their funding and of
course the central bank's never tell the
people the truth I mean think about it
go back to 2008 we're heading into a
recession the market crash in October
and Ben Bernanke was out there saying
listen we're not forecasting any type of
recession Janet Yellen right now is
saying that the yield curve might not be
a good recession signal in this
expansion why because it's different
this time no it's always the same there
is no difference they tell you this to
make you look the other way but what's
happening here is the central banks are
stuck Trump the Patriots they're going
after them the central banks know this
and they're trying to figure out a way
to stop it and they will strike back
with the deep state they will make a
move and we can see already that they're
trying to maneuver a way to make it look
like
it was all Trump's fault and the
Patriots behind him it's not just him
alone there's many people working with
him to take out the deep state to take
out the central bank this has been
planned for a very long time and right
now we can see that Trump's mission is
to prepare the United States
for the transition away from the central
banking system to transition us into a
people system where we don't have a
private corporation of unelected leaders
telling the people and the government
how to run the country the system and
how do they do this well all they have
to do is put the country into debt once
the country's into debt you can pretty
much tell them to do whatever you want
them to do you can start wars over it
you can have them make certain laws you
can push austerity and the central
bankers figure this out thousands of
years ago they knew that the real
control is the creation of currency and
putting countries into debt because once
you have a country into debt they will
have to do whatever you tell them to do
to get out of debt and this is how laws
are passed this is how they push their
agendas and the central banks sit in the
background these unelected leaders they
become very very wealthy but they're
never televised they're the ones who
hide in the shadows behind the curtain
and what is happening today is we're
pushing them out into the light pushing
them out into the light so people can
see who they are and what they do this
is white queue right in the very
beginning told us about all these
different central banks that they're
Rothschilds central banks systems that
were placed into each and every one of
these countries that the laws don't
pertain to them they're above the laws I
mean think about this for a second these
unelected individuals in the ECB the
Federal Reserve
IMF the biz can dictate what they want

look at their debt they say listen cut
this program cut that program do this do
that and countries just listen and who
are these people these people are not
elected by the people
these are unelected people that are
running each and every one of these
countries well everything is about to
change and this is why the central bank
is coming out and talking about what
Trump has been saying this is why Yellen
is saying it's unwise to comment on the

and when these individuals are being

this is what will destroy all of them
listen everyone thanks a lot for
